sqlGroup.name: billSnap
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT gameroomtype, count(*) num FROM t_bill_base_info WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? group by gameroomtype
SELECT gameroomtype, count(*) num FROM t_bill_base_info WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and totalgamenum>=10 group by gameroomtype
SELECT count(roomid) num FROM t_sng_bill_base_info Where createtime BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT count(roomid) num FROM t_sng_bill_base_info WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and totalgamenum>=10
SELECT gameroomtype,count(distinct uuid) num FROM t_bill_info a join t_bill_base_info b on a.roomid=b.roomid WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and buystacks>0 group by gameroomtype
SELECT count(distinct uuid) num FROM t_bill_info a join t_sng_bill_base_info b on a.roomid=b.roomid WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and buystacks>0
SELECT bigblind,count(distinct uuid) num FROM t_bill_info a join t_bill_base_info b on a.roomid=b.roomid WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and buystacks>0 and gameroomtype=? group by bigblind
SELECT bigblind,COUNT(*) num FROM t_bill_base_info WHERE createtime BETWEEN ? AND ? and gameroomtype = ? GROUP BY bigblind
